nodes.text: Len Carlson was a voice actor born in Canada. In Star Wars Droids, he played a number of characters. He also played Rocket Riding Hood, Bert in The Raccoons and Professor Coldheart in the first Care Bears series.

In his years alive, Carlson appeared on many shows for Nelvana like Rolie Polie Olie, Cyberchase, Pecola, Donkey Kong Country, and Beyblade. He also appeared on Atomic Betty. Len also appeared on other such shows as The Legend of Zelda, Dinosaucers, The Neverending Story, Medabots, Police Academy, Flying Rhino Junior High, X-Men, and Wild C.A.T.s.
He died in his sleep of a heart attack at the age of 68 in 2006. The Cyberchase episode Eco-Haven Ooze was dedicated to his memory, as was the Atomic Betty episode Takes One to Know One.
